content: Non-Pure is a very aggressive fighter, similar to Non-Able, but instead uses a large sweeping monk spade to attack in long combo swings that can be difficult to escape from. Finding opportunities to get your own attacks in can be difficult, but you'll need to resist the urge to jump in too early or you'll be hit and staggered multiple times.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Pure.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Pure', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-Pure' and the sub-subsection 'Non-Pure Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Non-Pure is a very aggressive fighter, similar to Non-Able, but instead uses a large sweeping monk spade to attack in long combo swings that can be difficult to escape from. Finding opportunities to get your own attacks in can be difficult, but you'll need to resist the urge to jump in too early or you'll be hit and staggered multiple times.
